snippet: As high-level negotiations swirled around the fate of the human rights advocate Chen Guangcheng, several members of his inner circle of supporters and "barefoot lawyers" were picked up by the Chinese authorities. The lawyer Jiang Tianyong, for...
abstract: As high-level negotiations swirled around the fate of the human rights advocate Chen Guangcheng, several members of his inner circle of supporters and "barefoot lawyers" were picked up by the Chinese authorities. The lawyer Jiang Tianyong, for example, says he was detained --- and beaten so badly that he lost the hearing in one ear.

headline.main: In the Chen Case, Collateral Damage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
